page.title: 19ATTITUDES TO FARMING
page.content: In the fields the farmers grow barley, corn, wheat, some of this was used for milling. They also grow different vegetables eg potatoes,turnips and swedes. Some people do not like the modern chemicals used for farming. One person disliked them because the chemicals were not allowed time to saok into the ground before the sheep were put in to feed who then got bad mouths. Another person disliked the chemical sprays used by aircraft because they kill more than just the weeds and insects they were intended for. Others do not mind using the chemicals although they may have some reservations about them.
